pull.title: 0.15 release-notes nits: fix redundancy, remove accidental parenthesis & fix range style
pull.body:
0.15 release-notes nits:
* Remove accidental parenthesis
* Fix redundancy ("remain" vs. previous "continue to remain")
* Fix range style ("from X to Y" vs. previous "from X-Y")

rename.to: 0.15 release-notes nits: fix redundancy, remove accidental parenthesis & fix range style

events.body: Travis failure for `p2p-leaktests.py` unrelated :-)  Is it just me or has the number of spurious Travis failures increased recently?
ACK after squashing. Please use a commit message that mentions updating the release notes.

events.message: Updating the release notes (minor stylistic changes)
